prop.name: bpm.vanilla.platform.jdbcDriverXmlFile
prop.title: Drivers File
prop.description: The vanilla xml file containing JDBC drivers that will be used for SQL Connection

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.platform.jdbcDriverFolder
prop.title: JDBC Drivers Folder
prop.description: The folder containing JDBC JAR drivers that will be used for SQL Connection

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.repository.limit.version.model
prop.title: Limit model version
prop.description: Limit number of version for a model (0 = no limit)

prop.name: bpm.public.group.id
prop.title: Public Group
prop.description: Group for public publication (Agila)

prop.name: bpm.public.repository.id
prop.title: Public Repository
prop.description: Repository for public publication (Agila)

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.authentication.timeOut
prop.title: Time out
prop.description: Time out (in millisecond) to test the connection when you open a soft

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.authentication.maxTry
prop.title: Maximum Try
prop.description: Max connection try allowed before block

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.authentication.maxTry.blockTime
prop.title: Block Time
prop.description: Block time after max try connection reached (in millisecond : 1800000 = 30 min). The system check every 3 min.

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.authentication.sortGroup
prop.title: Sort Groups
prop.description: True if you want the groups to be sort alphabetically in all connection parts (false otherwise)

prop.name: bpm.log4j.configurationFile
prop.title: Log4j configuration File
prop.description: Log4j configuration File, if not present the System property log4j.configuration will be used

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.server.historizationfolder
prop.title: Historization Folder
prop.description: Location to backup server activity

prop.name: bpm.web.service.url
prop.title: Web Service URL
prop.description: Url to connect to the web service (leave empty to disable web service or it can be http://localhost:8081/vanillaService)

prop.name: bpm.scheduler.start.time
prop.title: Start Time
prop.description: In millisecond - The check of jobs will start after that time

prop.name: bpm.scheduler.check.time
prop.title: Check Time
prop.description: In millisecond - It will check every define time the job to execute

prop.name: bpm.scheduler.relaunch.time
prop.title: Relaunch Time
prop.description: In millisecond - It will execute the job that should happen in the timelapse define on a restart server

prop.name: bpm.scheduler.use.utc.time
prop.title: Use UTC Time
prop.description: If true, it use UTC time and server time if false

prop.name: bpm.dashboard.export.delay
prop.title: Export Delay
prop.description: This delay is the time let by the program to load javascript (if your dashboard seems incomplete, put a longer delay)

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.server.reporting.server.repositoryPoolSize
prop.title: Repository Pool Size
prop.description: Maximum stored connection on Repository (with different context)

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.server.reporting.server.reportPoolSize
prop.title: Report Pool Size
prop.description: Number of ReportModel that will be cached in the server

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.server.reporting.server.generationFolder
prop.title: Generation Folder
prop.description: Folder where the generated report will be stored

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.server.reporting.server.birtReportEngineLogs
prop.title: Log Path
prop.description: Path for the log generated by the BirtPlatform

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.server.reporting.server.imagesUri
prop.title: JasperReports Images
prop.description: Folder used for JasperReports Images

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.server.gateway.server.repositoryPoolSize
prop.title: Repository Pool Size
prop.description: Maximum stored connection on Repository (with different context)

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.server.gateway.server.reportPoolSize
prop.title: Gateway Pool Size
prop.description: Number of GatewayModel that will be cached in the server

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.server.gateway.server.maxrows
prop.title: Gateway Buffer
prop.description: Number of lines in each batch for the gateway

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.webapps.url.deconnect
prop.title: Deconnect URL
prop.description: Redirection URL when you click on disconnect in the portal

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.user.image.folder
prop.title: Users Image Folder
prop.description: Folder that will contains user's personal images

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.login.css.path
prop.title: CSS Folder
prop.description: Path to the CSS file which define the css for the login page of the webapps

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.help.url
prop.title: Help Folder
prop.description: Path to the folder Help for the portal

prop.name: bpm.custom.properties.path
prop.title: Custom Properties Path
prop.description: Custom properties file path

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.default.theme
prop.title: Default Theme
prop.description: Theme to be used for the Portal css : it must be the CSS file within [VANILLA]/webapps/vanilla/css

prop.name: bpm.vanilla.server.useBirtViewer
prop.title: Enable BirtViewer
prop.description: BirtViewer webapp URL used is the one stored in the VanillaSetup (you can set it with EntrepriseServices but you will need to restart Vanilla)
